title: My big chance
creator_credit: Dennis Tupicoff and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A short animated film about an encounter between an employee and his boss. The boss’s cliches about the future of the business are illustrated by images on the screen. The future for the company and the right people is bright, but this employee is fired.
